result.title: Fib => log n (bu burda dursunda)
result.content:
this entry

void fib(int n, int&x, int&y){
    if(n==1){
        x = y = 1;
        return ;
    }


if(n&1){
    fib(n-1, y, x);
    y=(y+x)%mod;
}else{
    int a, b;
    fib(n>>1, a, b);
    y = (a*a+b*b)%mod;
    x = (a*b + a*(b-a+mod))%mod;
}

} ~~~~~
